miyagiya surathalun jiwathwa sitina aakarayenma sanrakshanaya kerena ‘adhishitha wiyalime‘ kramaye hasala nipunayaku wana markas, wartha wana aakarayata elesa ebandu sanrakshanayaka niyalena ekama pudgalaya bawayi pawasenne. ⏹ 1999 wasare sita wruththiya washayen saththwa malasiruru sanrakshanaye niyalena markas surathalun sanrakshanayata athagasuwe 2010 wasaredi ya. ⏹markas pawasana aakarayata ohu danata oostreliyawe ‘adhishitha wiyalime‘ sanrakshana kriyawaliye niratha dawanthamaya menma ekama pudgalayaya. ⏹samanyayen wasarakadi surathalun asuwak pamana adhishitha wiyalimen sanrakshanaya karana markasge saththwa malasiruru sanrakshana wyaparayen eya thunen ekaka prathishathayaki. ⏹ohu pawasana aakarayata ohu mema kramaya bhawithayen bahulawama sanrakshanaya karanne muwan ha wal uuran wani dadayam sathun wuwath, wadima aathma thrupthiyak labanne surathalun sanrakshanaya kirimeni. ⏹eya hudek dadayam sathun sanrakshanayata wada sankirnawuth, mana sanyamayakin sirumaruwata kala yuththak bawa markas pawasanne palapuruddeni. ⏹aadharakayakata sawikala saththwayage sama pamanak dadayamkaruwakuta pramanawath wuwath, surathal sathunge himikaruwan ewannakin sahimata pathwanne natha. ⏹surathalun sanrakshanaya kirimedi ema saththwaya jiwathwa sitiyadi dakwu hangim prakashana ha iriyaw kerehi dadi awadhanayak yomu kirimata siduwanne enisa ya. ⏹diga kalak thaman samanga ekata jiwithaya bedahadagath surathala jiwathwa sitiyadi bahulawama uhugen prakashawu hangim ha iriyaw maranayen pasuwa wuwada, eyakarayenma palawanu dakimata himikaruwan dakwanne imahath unanduwaki. ⏹me nisa thamage kriyanwithaya markas handunwanne surathalage dwimana chayarupayak wenuwata thrimana chayapitapathak nirmanaya kirimak lesaya. ⏹enam ehi sarthakathwaya randa pawathinne surathala jiwamanawa sanrakshanaya kirima mathayi.

eheth mahinda wadi yayi kiyagath sayibar wirayan ma dumindage pillayak lesath ma wishwasa nokarana lesath prabhanda godanaga rata wenuwen ma itu kala kapawim ee hiwalunge payata paganna thath kirima, yahapalanayen aa bawa pawasamin duminda saha ma pilibada charitha ghathanayanhi yedima, mage aaharayata wisak ek kirima, namal sahodaraya saha ma pilibadawa puhu prabhanda godanagima itha ninditha kriyawan lesa salakana athara mewarada athigaru janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathidunta yam kisi deshapalanamaya hanikara thathwayak athiwuwa hoth ee siyalu wagakim mekiyana sayibar wirakam dodamin mahinda nama wikunan kamin mahinda pakshikayangen kappam ganimin janathawa mula karana, kisidu deshapalana ho jana winyanayak nomathi me sayibar kalli kandayam wisin dariya yuthu bawa danwa sitimi.
